overview:
Nicolas is co-founder at Carambla and holds the position of CEO. Nicolas is also a co-founder at Academics for Companies, a non-profit organisation based in Leuven. Academics for Companies is a Junior Enterprise providing consultancy to SME and organizing practicing oriented trainings for university students with a background in engineering, law and business. Nowadays, Academics for Companies has about 500 members, and just opened up a new location in Brussels. Besides his passion to support new ventures, Nicolas worked in multicultural teams around the world on several projects in ICT and Cleantech. Before co-founding Carambla, Nicolas was the product leader of Dialogfeed, a project he initiated within Dialog Solutions, a social software company based in Brussels.

Nicolas holds a MSc degree in Global Entrepreneurship from business school EM Lyon and a MSc degree in commercial engineering from the Catholic University of Leuven. He is a strong motivator, opportunity driven, and has a passion to succeed.
